title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Last updated: October 2025

introduction.title: Your Privacy Matters
introduction.content: At CrushMe, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. We understand the sensitive nature of our products and are committed to maintaining the highest standards of confidentiality and discretion.

informationCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationCollection.subtitle: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
items: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, shipping address
Account Information: Username, password, preferences
Payment Information: Credit card details, billing address (processed securely)
Purchase History: Products ordered, gift transactions
Communication Data: Messages sent through our platform, customer service interactions

automaticCollection.title: 2. Automatically Collected Information
automaticCollection.content: When you use our platform, we automatically collect certain information:
items: Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system
Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent on pages, links clicked
Cookies: We use cookies to enhance your experience and remember your preferences

useOfInformation.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
useOfInformation.content: We use your information for the following purposes:
items: Process and fulfill your orders
Manage your account and provide customer support
Send you order confirmations and shipping updates
Facilitate gift sending between users
Improve our products and services
Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
Comply with legal obligations

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do NOT sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: Service Providers: Third-party companies that help us operate our platform (payment processors, shipping companies) under strict confidentiality agreements
Legal Requirements: When required by law, court order, or government request
Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
With Your Consent: When you explicitly agree to share information

discreteShipping.title: 5. Discreet Shipping and Packaging
discreteShipping.content: We understand the private nature of our products. All orders are:
items: Shipped in plain, unmarked packaging
Listed on shipping labels with a generic company name
Delivered without any indication of contents
Protected with privacy seals and secure packaging

giftPrivacy.title: 6. Gift Sending Privacy
giftPrivacy.content: When you send a gift to another user:
items: The recipient will only see your username (not your real name or address)
Your payment information is never shared with the recipient
Gift messages are transmitted securely and privately
Recipients can decline gifts, and we respect their privacy preferences

dataSecurity.title: 7. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
items: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
Secure payment processing through PCI-compliant providers
Regular security audits and updates
Restricted access to personal information
Password protection and account security features

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. You can request deletion of your account and personal data at any time, subject to legal retention requirements.

yourRights.title: 9. Your Privacy Rights
items: Access your personal information
Request correction of inaccurate data
Request deletion of your account and data
Opt-out of marketing communications
Disable cookies through your browser settings
Request a copy of your data in a portable format

ageVerification.title: 10. Age Verification
ageVerification.content: Our services are strictly for adults 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect information from minors. If we become aware that a minor has provided us with personal information, we will take steps to delete such information immediately.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 11. Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to read their privacy policies before providing any information.

international.title: 12. International Users
international.content: If you are accessing our platform from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States. By using our services, you consent to this transfer.

changes.title: 13. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our platform and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

commitment: We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining your trust. Thank you for choosing CrushMe.
